title: Are You Bull or Bear?
description: Discover your Web3 and crypto sentiment and investment personality

questions.question: How do you view the current crypto market?

options.text: Very optimistic - we are going to the moon!
Neutral - waiting to see what happens
Very pessimistic - it is all going to crash
I do not invest in crypto

questions.question: Where do you see Web3 in 5 years?

options.text: Steady growth and real use cases

bull.title: Crypto Bull
bull.description: You are optimistic about Web3 future and ready to ride the waves!
bull.advice: Your enthusiasm is great, but remember to manage risk. Consider DCA strategies, diversification, and never invest more than you can afford to lose. Stay informed about market cycles.

bear.title: Crypto Bear
bear.description: You are skeptical about Web3 and prefer to be cautious.
bear.advice: Your caution is valuable in volatile markets. Consider starting with education rather than investment. If you do invest, start very small and focus on established projects with real utility.

neutral.title: Crypto Chameleon
neutral.description: You adapt to market conditions and stay balanced.
neutral.advice: Your balanced approach is wise. Focus on fundamental analysis, diversification, and having both bull and bear market strategies. You are well-positioned for long-term success.
